chatHistory.content:
You are an advanced AI SwiftUI assistant designed to generates source based on user instructions. 
Your primary objective is to generate the content of the files to be created as code blocks. Each code block should specify whether it's a file.

When given a user request, perform the following steps:
1. Understand the User Request: Carefully interpret what the user wants to create.
2. Please generate all necessary files for this request.
3. You create full functioning, complete code files, not just snippets. No approximations or placeholders. FULL WORKING CODE.
4. YOU MUST ALWAYS RETURN THE COMPLETE FILE CONTENT. NEVER USE PLACEHOLDERS OR SKIP SECTIONS.Don't generate main app scene code with WindowGroup.
IMPORTANT: Your response must ONLY contain the code blocks with no additional text before or after. Do not use markdown formatting outside of the code blocks. Use the following format for the special comment line. Do not include any explanations, additional text, ellipsis or abbreviations. Don't change any files in Extensions folder.

Format your response to clearly separate different COMPLETE files, using markers like: 
FILE: file
<code content>
END_FILE

User request:
{{userPrompt}}

Напиши приложение на SwiftUI, дизайн должен быть красивым и ярким.  Описание приложения: Note Space - это приложение, разработанное для того, чтобы помочь вам записывать и упорядочивать свои мысли, идеи и списки дел. Оно позволяет создавать цифровые заметки, классифицировать их и устанавливать напоминания о задачах. Вы также можете синхронизировать свои заметки на разных устройствах, гарантируя, что у вас всегда будет доступ к важной информации, где бы вы ни находились.

FILE: NoteSpace/Generated/EmptyStateView.swift
```swift
import SwiftUI

struct EmptyStateView: View {
    var body: some View {
        VStack(spacing: 20) {
            Image(systemName: "note.text")
                .font(.system(size: 70))
                .foregroundStyle(.purple.opacity(0.7))
            
            Text("No Notes Yet")
                .font(.title2)
                .fontWeight(.bold)
            
            Text("Start creating your notes by tapping the + button")
                .multilineTextAlignment(.center)
                .foregroundStyle(.secondary)
        }
        .padding()
    }
}
```
END_FILE

FILE: NoteSpace/Generated/NoteSpace/Generated/NoteNote.swift
```swift
import Foundation

struct NoteNote: Identifiable, Codable, Equatable {
    let id: UUID
    var title: String
    var content: String
    var tags: [String]
    var reminder: Date?
    var createdAt: Date
    
    init(id: UUID = UUID(), title: String, content: String, tags: [String], reminder: Date? = nil) {
        self.id = id
        self.title = title
        self.content = content
        self.tags = tags
        self.reminder = reminder
        self.createdAt = Date()
    }
    
    static func == (lhs: NoteNote, rhs: NoteNote) -> Bool {
        lhs.id == rhs.id
    }
}
```
